object.name: collar
object.description: A lamia collar is on the ground.

object.name: breast plate iron
object.description: A beautiful iron breast plate lies here.

object.name: staff serpentine
object.description: A green serpentine staff has been left here.

object.name: scroll magic
object.description: A scroll of magical enchantment has been left here.

object.name: scroll bound
object.description: A bound scroll of detection lies at your feet.

object.name: fountain
object.description: An elaborate white marble fountain is here.

extra_description.description:
You see the most beautiful fountain in the world.  The white marble glistens
                     |as sunlight hits its wet surfaces.  Fish swim around in the inner fountain, and
                     |an exterior fountain is reserved just for drinking.

object.name: desk
object.description: A beautiful desk made from a gigantic sea shell is here.

extra_description.description:
The sea shell desk here is just gorgeous.  The creamy white of the table
                     |surface makes you dream of being in a pool swimming among mermaids.

object.name: cabinet
object.description: A sturdy glass cabinet is here.

extra_description.description:
A cabinet made of oak and mahogany, this piece of woodmanship is just splendid 
                     |to view.  The wood is varnished with a very strong stain that looks as if it
                     |would last longer than the cabinet itself.

object.name: mandolin
object.description: A mandolin lies against the wall.

object.name: harp golden
object.description: A beautiful golden harp is waiting to be played.

object.name: flute silver
object.description: A brilliant silver flute glimmers from its holster.

object.name: potion green
object.description: You see a green potion on the floor.

object.name: bluish herbs
object.description: Some bluish herbs are scattered here.

object.name: purplish herbs
object.description: Some purplish herbs are scattered here.

object.name: grayish herbs
object.description: Some grayish herbs are scattered here.

object.name: orangish herbs
object.description: Some orangish herbs are scattered here.

object.name: sword
object.description: You see an imperial sword here.

extra_description.description:
You see a sword of great craftsmanship.  Imprinted on the side is:
                     |Merc Industries
